name: opencode
description: Meta-plugin for OpenCode that helps create, debug, and manage OpenCode plugins, agents, and skills with AI assistance
author: prpm

packages.name: plugin-helper
packages.description: Utility plugin for debugging and scaffolding OpenCode plugins with event logging, template scaffolding, and developer commands

packages.name: plugin-builder-agent
packages.description: AI agent specialized in creating OpenCode plugins with expert knowledge of all 32+ events and best practices

packages.name: agent-builder-agent
packages.description: AI agent specialized in creating OpenCode agents with expert knowledge of agent configuration, modes, tools, and best practices

packages.name: create-plugin-command
packages.description: Slash command to scaffold new OpenCode plugins from templates (basic, security, notification, custom-tool, logging)

packages.name: create-agent-command
packages.description: Slash command to scaffold new OpenCode agents from templates (primary, plan, review, docs, security, test)

packages.name: prpm-json-skill
packages.description: Best practices for structuring prpm.json package manifests with required fields, tags, organization, multi-package management, and conversion hints
